ques: Which is not a new feature that is introduced in ES6?

answer: Vue.js is an open-source model–view–viewmodel front end JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications. It was created by Evan You, and released in the year 2014.

ques: Which of these is not a lifecycle of Vue?
answer: Before create,Created,Before mount,Mounted,Before update,Updated,Before destroy and Destroyed are the lifecycles of vue.

ques: Which of these is a block element of HTML?
answer: Block level elements take up as much space as possible by default. p,div,ol,ul are block elements.

ques: Inside which HTML element do we put the JavaScript?
answer: Javascript is called in the src attribute of the script tag.
